HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019DBS vickers can buy USA, SG, HKSE etcDBS Vickers requires MCA A/C.2 comments2
Question Poster03 Oct 2018How does one apply for IPO on HKSE? HC Tang03 Oct 2018Via DBSV IPO Centre at their secure site. See: https://trweb.dbsvonline.com/TR/Help/InitialPublicOffering
